All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
Account
Author: Darren, Min Xuan, Monika, Teren, Jana, Amanda, Kirby E-mail: - Date: 20240219 Description: The Account class represents a basic financial account with deposit, withdrawal, and balance operations, as well as transfer operations to other accounts.
Bank
The Bank class represents a bank that manages a list of accounts, PIN validation, and account balance.
BusinessLoan
Represents a Business Loan, extending the Loan class.
CreditCard
The CreditCard class represents a credit card with attributes such as card number, spending limit, amount spent as well as methods for payments and reward point calculations.
Customer
The Customer class represents the customer's personal information with methods to access and modify the information.
Demo
The Demo class contains the main method to test the functionality of the banking system.
Exchange
The Exchange class facilitates currency exchange with predefined exchange rates.
Guarantor
Represents a Guarantor entity.
Loan
Represents a Loan entity.
MonthlyStatement
Represents a monthly statement for a customer's account.
PersonalLoan
Represents a Personal Loan, extending the Loan class.
StudyLoan
Represents a Study Loan, extending the Loan class.
Transaction
Represents a financial transaction.
